items.sentence: What Tom said was a fraud turned out not to be.
Tom turned around to see who was following him.
Tom didn't notice that Mary wasn't in the room.
It was the worst pain Tom had ever experienced.
I wish that I'd had more time to talk with Tom.
I forgot to put on sunscreen and got sunburned.
Tom and Mary got married three years ago today.
I know you probably didn't do that by yourself.
I'm your best friend. You can tell me anything.
Can you guess what I want to talk to you about?
It'll take several hours for this paint to dry.
Tom seems to be tempted to tell Mary the truth.
I'm looking for a book to help me learn French.
Hard work alone doesn't always lead to success.
Are you really interested in my honest opinion?
Nobody has ever done anything like this before.
Don't say anything that you might regret later.
I'm a disappointment to all my French teachers.
Nobody swims in the lagoon because it's filthy.
My feet hurt because these shoes are too small.
